Servings - 8 DosaÂ  Duration - 20 mins Rice flour is made out of rice, often used in South Indian dishes and also prepares many recipes out of it such as snacksÂ and breakfast recipes. Crispy Chegodilu /Rice flour rings Rice Flour Murukullu / Biyapindi Karallu/ Karapusa Tapilintu / Akki roti / Rice flour roti Vadappa / Rice Flour Puri/ Chawal Ki Puri || Instant Recipe Rice flour Roti/ Chawal ki Roti It's is easily available in super markets all over India/ Indian stores in other countries.Â Grab a pack and ready to make recipes with rice flour. Today, I prepared Instant Veg Dosa/ Rice flour Dosa with spices, ginger, grated carrot and onion. Let's start with Ingredients and follows procedure Ingredients: Rice flour - 1 cup Semolina/ Rava/ Sooji - 1/2 cup Cumin/ Jeera seeds - 1 teaspoon Green chillies - finely chopped - 3 Curry leaves - 5 - chopped Ginger - chopped - 1 tb sp Grated carrot - 3 tb sp Finely chopped onion - 1/2 cup Coriander - chopped - 1/2 cup Salt - to taste Oil - 3 tb sp - to cook dosa Procedure:
  • In medium sized bowl add salt,green chillies,ginger, grated carrot, onion, coriander and curry leaves
  • Add rice and semolina in bowl and mix well
  • Add 3 cups of water and mix
  • Rest 10-15 mins, batter should be pouring consistency
  • Heat tava on medium to high
  • Everytime, mix well the batter before pouring on tava. If required add water
  • Spread 2 ladles of batter on tava
  • Don't pour batter at center of tava, spread batter all over on tava
  • Apply oil
  • Flip when color changes to brown
  • Â Cook the other side
  • Dish out when Cooked well
  • Crunchy and golden color Instant Veg Dosa is ready
  • Serve it with Coconut Chutney/Â Coriander Coconut Chutney / Kothimeera Kobbari Chutney
